content: [TextBlock(text="[2025 | Age 22] Just landed in Tokyo, and the energy here is palpable, like NYC but with a twist of tech-forward tranquility. I'm walking around with my $XVI token on a necklace, feeling like it's my digital passport in this new world. Makes me wonder if our identities will soon be just a string of code, a thought that's both thrilling and a bit eerie. #NoMorePassports?", type='text')]
